amendment.description: At the end of the bill, before the short title, insert the following: SEC.___.None of the funds made available in this Act may be used within the borders of the State of Louisiana by the Mississippi Valley Division or the Southwestern Division of the Army Corps of Engineers or any district of the Corps within such divisions to implement or enforce the mitigation methodology, referred to as the "Modified Charleston Method".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to implement or enforce the mitigation methodology, referred to as the "Modified Charleston Method", within the borders of Louisiana.
